description:
Fasten your seat belts & drive as a Police Officer.
You have to prove yourself as a fearless and courageous police officer to resist against crimes and follow the criminals’ cars to stop crime in the city. You have to be the expert police car driver to chase robbers, criminals and street racers. Drive furiously on the city streets with, smashing, chasing and car stunts. Criminals and Street robbers are getting away with crime so its time to fulfill your duty as a trained police officer driver to chase criminals, robbers and street racers. It’s time to get wild with police car chase to crash offending cars.
It’s a real police vs. thief simulator game where you will feel the heat of a real cop car driver, hunt the thief and criminals to clear the city of crime. Intense racing, sharp turns and criminal chase make the game more addictive and interesting. Chase criminals on your duty police car, smash them and arrest robbers, thief and street racers. Be cautious with the traffic including cars and buses on the roads and avoid any parking just chase the robbers and other criminals. Don’t smash into a citizen’s car, just reach at crime scene as soon as possible. It’s your duty to protect the city premises and arrest criminals. Have crazy and extreme car driving, racing, drifting and chasing with police car in this cop chase & smash simulator. The real adventure and challenging game-play missions will make you drive with extreme speed on a pursuit against criminals.
Surely! You have not played such type of police car chase game yet. So revive the uniqueness in police car chase games blended with the concept of 3D real city environment. It's your time to show some courage and responsibility required to chase and capture the criminals, robbers and street racers. So take it now and enjoy the crazy drive of Police car chase simulator 3D.
